# Data used in this book {#sec-data-files}


```{r}
#| include: false

ui_list <- function(vec) {
  for (x in vec) {
    cat("-", x, "\n")
  }
}

data <- data.frame(
  Files = list.files("data/"),
  link = list.files("data/", full.names = TRUE)
)
 code <- data.frame(
  Files = list.files("../data/code/"),
  link = list.files("../data/code/", full.names = TRUE)
)
if (file.exists("/data/Rway-enfR_data_code.zip")) {
  file.remove("/data/Rway-enfR_data_code.zip")
}
zip("/data/Rway-enfR_data_code.zip", c("/data/")) # , "../data/R_code/"))
```

## All in one zip file

Tous les fichiers de données et de code dans un [**fichier zip**](./data/Rway-enfR_data_code.zip)

## All the data files

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
apply(data, 1, function(x) paste0("[", x[1], "](", x[2], ")")) |>
  ui_list()
```

## Code R et fonctions utilisées dans les diapositives

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
#| output: asis
apply(code, 1, function(x) paste0("[", x[1], "](", x[2], ")")) |>
  ui_list()
```
